name: Square Diz Pendant w/ Threader  Olivewood / Cat's Claw
description:
This is what happens when you get a Wood Turner and a Fiber Artist/ Jewelry Marker consorting on a project together! A diz that you can also make a fashion statement with! :) 

Gary made the diz out of local Olivewood with local Cat's Claw in the center. There are  3 different hole sizes. I wire wrapped it in Brass wire. It also includes a brass threader to pull you fiber though. 

The threaders are made of brass wire with  glass, metal or hand made paper beads.   

The picture of Threaders are examples of the ones I make. At checkout, please leave a comment for first and second color choice and I will pick out one in that color.

name: Jeannie Bowl Spindle Bowl  JB02 Figured Pine/ Lignum Vitae
description:
Jeannie Bowl Spindle Bowl JB02

This petite Jeannie Bowl is made from highly figured Pine with a Lignum Vitae center. The figured Pine has some beautiful grain lines in it and is very unique. The Lignum Vitae bowl center provides a very hard smooth surface to reduce friction while spinning. 

The bottom of the bowl has a circle of cork to keep it from slipping on a table. The wood is sanded, buffed and then polished with a waterproof wax.

The bowl is 1 1/2" wide by 1 1/4" tall. The center Lignum spinning bowl is 1/2" wide.

name: Reverse-A-Bowl Spindle Bowl RO02 Oak
description:
Reverse-A-Bowl Spindle Bowl RO02

Gary came up with this design for a reversible bowl that sits just as stable on your lap as on a table. While this bowl is a simplified version of the Fancy Bowls, it is still made with the same quality and care and it still sits just a beautifully on your lap or on a table.

Each piece is hand turned, sanded, buffed and polished to make it nice and smooth. They have what Gary calls "feel appeal".

Even though the spinning bowl is small, it should accommodate any support spindle. 

The bowl is made from American White Oak.
 It is 3" at the widest and 3 1/4" tall.
It comes in a decorative pouch.

name: Fancy Reverse-A-Bowl Spindle Bowl FR05  Bubinga/ Oak/ Lignum
description:
Gary came up with this design for a reversible bowl that sits just as stable on your lap as on a table. It is also a beautiful example  of form meets function.

Each piece is hand turned, sanded, buffed and polished to make it nice and smooth. They have what Gary calls "feel appeal". The actual bowl used for spinning on each side is made from Lignum Vitae. Lignum is one of the hardest woods in the world, therefore reducing friction between spindle and bowl for expanded spinning times and an extended wear factor.  Even though the spinning bowl is small, it should accommodate any support spindle. 

The body of this bowl is made of Bubinga. The design is comprised of Oak and the Lignum Vitae bowl as the centers on both sides. Each side having a unique design of it's own even though its the same pieces of wood.


The bowl weighs 2.8 ounces. It is 2 3/4" at the widest and 3" tall.
It comes in a decorative pouch.

U.S. orders will ship Priority.
All other orders will ship First Class International.

name: Fancy Reverse-A-Bowl Spindle Set FRS01
description:
Fancy Reverse-Bowl Spindle Set 

This is a very unique set that Gary has spent a lot of time putting together and is truly a work of art!

 Gary came up with the design for a reversible bowl that sits just as stable on your lap as on a table. It is also a beautiful example  of form meets function.

Each piece is hand turned, sanded, buffed and polished to make it nice and smooth. They have what Gary calls "feel appeal". The actual bowl used for spinning on each side is made from Lignum Vitae. Lignum is one of the hardest woods in the world, therefore reducing friction between spindle and bowl for expanded spinning times and an extended wear factor.  Even though the spinning bowl is small, it should accommodate any support spindle. 

The body of this bowl is made of a beautiful piece of Bird's Eye Maple. The design is comprised of American White Holly and a deep Pink Ivory and the Lignum Vitae bowl as the centers on both sides. Each side having a unique design of it's own even though its the same pieces of wood.

The spindle is made from American White Holly, a beautiful piece of Pink Ivory and it has Lignum Vitae in the tip. It spins very smooth and balanced and for a long time. 

The bowl weighs 4.4 ounces. It is 3 3/4" at the widest and 3" tall.
It comes in a decorative pouch.
The spindle weighs 1 ounce and is 10 1/4" in length.

U.S. orders will ship Priority.
All other orders will ship First Class International.

name: Fancy Reverse-A-Bowl Spindle Bowl FR04 Bubinga/ Padauk/ Oak/ Mesquite/ Lignum
description:
Gary came up with this design for a reversible bowl that sits just as stable on your lap as on a table. It is also a beautiful example  of form meets function.

Each piece is hand turned, sanded, buffed and polished to make it nice and smooth. They have what Gary calls "feel appeal". The actual bowl used for spinning on each side is made from Lignum Vitae. Lignum is one of the hardest woods in the world, therefore reducing friction between spindle and bowl for expanded spinning times and an extended wear factor.  Even though the spinning bowl is small, it should accommodate any support spindle. 

The body of this bowl is made of Bubinga. The design is comprised of Padauk, Mesquite and Oak and the Lignum Vitae bowl as the centers on both sides. Each side having a unique design of it's own even though its the same pieces of wood.


The bowl weighs 2.8 ounces. It is 2 3/4" at the widest and 3" tall.
It comes in a decorative pouch.

U.S. orders will ship Priority.
All other orders will ship First Class International.

name: SPOOKY  Romney Wool/Pumpkin Seqiuns 86 yards
description:
Spooky- Romney Wool/ Pumpkins Sequins
86 yards
10 WPI
2 ply

Spooky yarn just in time for Halloween. 2-ply yard hand spun from natural black Romney wool that is plied with 2 strands of cotton sewing thread with bright orange pumpkin sequins. Perfect for a scary night! :)
